title: CVD Simulator: A Scientifically-Validated Tool for Color Vision Deficiency Simulation
description: A comprehensive Python package for simulating color vision deficiencies (CVD) including protanopia, deuteranopia, tritanopia, and achromatopsia. Unifies multiple peer-reviewed algorithms (Brettel 1997, Vi√©not 1999, Machado 2009) with configurable severity levels, batch processing, and production-ready features.
